    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pair of forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paar Kräfte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paire de forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Par das forças</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accoppiamento delle forze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζευγάρι των δυνάμεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Par de fuerzas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a man sitting on a chair. Also shown are the pair of opposite forces acting on the legs of the chain and on the floor.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">man</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Push</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stool</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Mann, der auf einem 
Stuhl sitzt. Auch gezeigt das Paar der gegenüberliegenden 
Kräfte, die auf den Beinen der Kette und auf dem Fußboden fungieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un homme s'asseyant sur
une chaise. En outre montrées sont la paire de forces opposées
agissant sur les jambes de la chaîne et sur le plancher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um homem que senta-se em 
uma cadeira. É mostrado também o par das forças opostas que 
agem nos pés da corrente e no assoalho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un uomo che si siede 
su una sedia. Egualmente è indicato l'accoppiamento delle forze
opposte che si comportano sui piedini della catena e sul pavimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συνεδρίαση ατόμων σε μια 
καρέκλα. Επίσης εμφανίζεται το ζευγάρι των αντίθετων 
δυνάμεων ενεργώντας στα πόδια της αλυσίδας και στο πάτωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a hombre que se sienta 
en una silla. También se muestra el par de fuerzas opuestas que
actúan en las piernas del encadenamiento y en el suelo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stuhl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
